channel.title: CVE Feed for Dolibarr -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dolibarr -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-5314|2024-05-24T10:00:45.430Z -- Dolibarr -- ERP CMS
item.description: Vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP - CRM that affect version 9.0.1 and allow SQL injection. These vulnerabilities could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the system and retrieve all the information stored in the database through the parameters sortorder y sortfield in /dolibarr/admin/dict.php.

item.title: CVE-2024-5315|2024-05-24T10:06:49.112Z -- Dolibarr -- ERP CMS
item.description:
Vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP - CRM that affect version 9.0.1 and allow SQL injection. These vulnerabilities could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the system and retrieve all the information stored in the database through the parameters
viewstatut in /dolibarr/commande/list.php.
